spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe structural failure. The bathroom, which should be a central island, has been moved to the rear wall. Door and window counts do not match the floor plan. The fireplace/chimney feature from the living room is absent.

structural_fidelity.notes: The internal wall configuration is fundamentally different from the source. The stairs have been rendered as a central open element rather than a contained side-wall feature. Hallucinated dividing walls added in the living area.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and appliances are missing or replaced with generic furniture. Bedroom furniture (bed) is hallucinated as there is no designated bedroom in the floor plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent rendering quality with clean isometric perspective, soft lighting, and professional materials. Unfortunately, it fails as an architectural visualization due to inaccuracy.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom central island moved to the back corner wall.
Hallucinated bedroom furniture and internal partition walls not present in 2D plan.
Missing kitchen fixtures (stove, sink counter) and living room fireplace.
Staircase orientation and proportions do not match the designated 2D dimensions.
Entrance door and side windows incorrectly aligned relative to the internal layout.
